description:
We are upgrading our environment from icehouse to kilo and discovered that new deployment no longer allows admin password injection. 

SETUP:

Deployed using Mirantis 7.0

2x Controller nodes
2x Ceph storage
many compute nodes

Compute node is already setup as

inject_password=true
inject_key=true


Key injection works fine, its only the setting root password from dashboard that does not work.
title: Cannot inject root password

comments.content:
We are upgrading our environment from icehouse to kilo and discovered that new deployment no longer allows admin password injection. 

SETUP:

Deployed using Mirantis 7.0

2x Controller nodes
2x Ceph storage
many compute nodes

inject_key=true


Key injection works fine, its only the setting root password from dashboard that does not work.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yellowcirclenet

comments.content:
@Navneet Grewal:

We need more information => "Incomplete"

* Could you please double-check if the behavior is the same when you use the Nova CLI?
* Please attach the logs from Horizon from the controller node.
* Please attach the logs from nova-compute of the compute node.
* When you use "libguestfs" on the compute nodes, please attach those logs too.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
